quote: I am vengeance. I am the night. I am Batman!
It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
I wear a mask. And that mask, it's not to hide who I am, but to create what I am.
You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
I have one power. I never give up.
I'm whatever Gotham needs me to be.
Criminals are a superstitious cowardly lot.
A hero can be anyone.
Sometimes the truth isn't good enough. Sometimes people deserve more.
I’m the goddamn Batman.
Justice is about more than revenge.
I have to believe that when my hand is on the trigger, I'm doing the right thing.
I made a promise on the grave of my parents that I would rid this city of the evil that took their lives.
I’m not in it for the glory. I do it because I have to.
I have given a name to my pain, and it is Batman.
I’m whatever Gotham needs me to be.
Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded.
I’m not the one wearing hockey pads.
I’m not afraid. I’m angry.
I’m not a hero. I’m a silent guardian, a watchful protector.
I’m not a man. I’m something more.
I’m not a symbol. I’m a man.
I’m not a monster. I’m just ahead of the curve.
I’m not a killer. I’m a protector.
I’m not a vigilante. I’m a soldier.
I’m not a god. I’m just a man.
I’m not a myth. I’m real.
I’m not a dream. I’m a nightmare.
I’m not a joke. I’m a threat.
I’m not a legend. I’m a warning.
I’m not a story. I’m a reality.
I’m not a whisper. I’m a roar.
I’m not a shadow. I’m the darkness.
I’m not a question. I’m the answer.
I’m not a puzzle. I’m the solution.
I’m not a riddle. I’m the truth.
I’m not a game. I’m the end.
I’m not a phase. I’m permanent.
I’m not a trend. I’m timeless.
I’m not a moment. I’m eternity.
I’m not a flicker. I’m the flame.
I’m not a whisper. I’m the scream.
I’m not a breeze. I’m the storm.
I’m not a ripple. I’m the wave.
I’m not a spark. I’m the fire.
I’m not a note. I’m the symphony.
I’m not a beat. I’m the rhythm.
I’m not a line. I’m the story.
I’m not a page. I’m the book.
I’m not a chapter. I’m the saga.
I’m not a scene. I’m the movie.
